entries.title: Press Release - BMA Earns Prestigious International Accolades
entries.text: The BMA announced it has received multiple international recognitions by earning the prestigious LEED® certification in green building design for BMA House.

entries.title: Fraudulent Social Media Postings Linked to PrimeAurora - BMA
entries.text: The social media posting and pdf document directs readers to an online crypto-currency trading platform called PrimeAurora.
